Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'But I promised to not use your tear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Where there is a will, there is a way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'As long as I keep seeking, there must be another solution.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Big Fish', 3: "You are right, but I can't make any use out of this tear.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Big Fish', 3: 'At least take this drop. Just take it as a token of appreciation from me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'But Master told me to always keep my promise.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Big Fish', 3: "You also promised old panda to bring my tear back, didn't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Big Fish', 3: "Take it. The one you want to save must be important to you. I'd like to help you out.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Pulao can react, Big Fish quickly puts the tear in her water bottle and returns it to her hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Big Fish', 3: "Alright, don't waste your time here. Stop arguing and go back to those who need you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Here, take my contact. You can come to me anytime if you need a listener.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Big Fish', 3: 'Haha, no problem. All the best.', 4: '1'}
